thread.title: Trump blocks Democrats' memo, calling it 'very political and long'

title: Trump blocks Democrats' memo, calling it 'very political and long'
text:
Trump blocks Democrats' memo, calling it 'very political and long' 2:14pm EST - 02:22 
President Donald Trump on Friday blocked the release of a classified memo written by congressional Democrats to rebut a Republican document that he allowed to be made public last week that claimed FBI and Justice Department bias against him in the federal probe of Russia and the 2016 U.S. election. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Donald Trump on Friday blocked the release of a classified memo written by congressional Democrats to rebut a Republican document that he allowed to be made public last week that claimed FBI and Justice Department bias against him in the federal probe of Russia and the 2016 U.S. election.
